name: Norton AntiVirus Scan File
summary: Learn about .SCA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SCA files are typically located in the Tasks directory of a Norton AntiVirus installation. They are commonly seen with the filename mycomp.sca.
NOTE: Symantec introduced the ".sca" extension with Norton AntiVirus 2002. Norton AntiVirus became Norton Security in 2014.

description: Data file created by Norton AntiVirus, a program that protects desktop computers from malware; contains a list of files on the hard drive that have been scanned or need to be scanned; used by Norton AntiVirus to tell which files need to be scanned next.
